ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:52:06 [Issue ID 4000-101121] urn:comicvine:4000-101121 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-20 02:16:21. [Issue ID 101121]
ComicInfo.Summary: Sam is alone on the case of a gruesome murder, the only clue is a message written in blood that states "Where's Wanda".Meanwhile Jason Wynn realizes he's just murdered someone, while wearing face paint that resembles the clowns face.He tries to wash the blood off of his hands, only to be visited by the clown once more.The reason same was alone on the case, is because detective Twitch Williams was too busy at the moment, detaining Al.Twitch begins to play a sick game with Al, waving a gun around, telling him cryptic thoughts, until Al finally has enough of it, and dawns of symbiotic costume. It's then he teaches Twitch a little lesson about life, and death.
ComicInfo.Title: Wake Up Dreaming - Part V
